result.execSummary:
The defendant Gregory Bernard Cotton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: RCJ for contempt for failure to pay.  Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law if not previously provided.  Defendant must pay mandatory DNA surcharge.

Defendant Gregory Bernard Cotton in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Defendant Gregory Bernard Cotton in custody.  Chris D Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Jane Slaght.
Parties have reviewed the PSI and note no additions or corrections for the record. 

15CF1058: Ct.1-3: 1 yr RCJ- Concurrent to each other. 

15CF1413: Ct.1- 6 yrs WPS 3 yr IC/3 yr ES- Consecutive to 15CF1058

15CM1767: Ct.1- 1 yr RCJ Concurrent to 15CF1058 & 16CF754. Consecutive to 15CF1413

16CF754: Cts. 2 & 3- 1 yr RCJ- Concurrent to each other & 15CF1058, Consecutive to 15CF1413

CONDITIONS: 
Absolute sobriety
Random UAs/Breathalyzers
No association with drug dealers/users
AODA counseling
Full time employment
GED/HSED
No contact with all victims. S.M, D.D. L.G.
Mental health assessment
Take all meds as prescribed.
Restitution: $500-S.M.
FAW
VOTE
DNA Sample
CC+COS+DNA surcharges
CFTS.
